name: Field of Fate
description:
Field of Fate is a tactical chess-like game where two forces clash on the eternal battlefield. The prototype was built for ChessJam 2018, and since then I have been working on developing it further! The build on this page is the latest version of the game, but if you're interesting in playing the original ChessJam submission you can do so here.

Feel free to leave your feedback on the current build in the forum, it would be greatly appreciated.
